err.message:
CypressError: Timed out retrying after 4050ms: `cy.click()` failed because the page updated while this command was executing. Cypress tried to locate elements based on this query:

> cy.get(button[type='submit'])

We initially found matching element(s), but while waiting for them to become actionable, they disappeared from the page. Common situations why this happens:
  - Your JS framework re-rendered asynchronously
  - Your app code reacted to an event firing and removed the element

You can typically solve this by breaking up a chain. For example, rewrite:

> `cy.get('button').click().click()`

to

> `cy.get('button').as('btn').click()`
> `cy.get('@btn').click()`

https://on.cypress.io/element-has-detached-from-dom
err.estack:
CypressError: Timed out retrying after 4050ms: `cy.click()` failed because the page updated while this command was executing. Cypress tried to locate elements based on this query:

> cy.get(button[type='submit'])

We initially found matching element(s), but while waiting for them to become actionable, they disappeared from the page. Common situations why this happens:
  - Your JS framework re-rendered asynchronously
  - Your app code reacted to an event firing and removed the element

You can typically solve this by breaking up a chain. For example, rewrite:

> `cy.get('button').click().click()`

to

> `cy.get('button').as('btn').click()`
> `cy.get('@btn').click()`

tests.title: Add an item to cart from the product detail page
tests.fullTitle: Verify Product Details Add an item to cart from the product detail page
tests.code:
//go to the product detail page 
_pDetail.default.goToDetailPage(); //wait for page to load

cy.wait(3000); //add item to the cart 
_pDetail.default.addSweatshirt();
cy.get(_pDetail.default.cart).should('be.visible'); //this image should be the selected in the main view
cy.url().should('include', _routes.default.detailed); //test should be done on product detail page
cy.get(_pDetail.default.cart).should('contain.text', '50'); //the price of the item should be reflected in cart
